io.commercetools.sunrise.cms

Class CmsIdentifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.commercetools.sunrise.cms.CmsIdentifier

  • public final class CmsIdentifier
extends java.lang.Object
    CMS Identifier, consisting of the field name and the content type and key. - entryType: type of entry which usually defines the fields it can contain (e.g. banner) - entryKey: key that identifies the particular entry (e.g. homeTopLeft) - fieldName: field name of the required content (e.g. subtitle)
    See Also:
    CmsService

      • getArrayElement

        @Nullable
public static java.lang.String getArrayElement(java.lang.String[] array,
                                                         int position,
                                                         java.lang.String defaultValue)
        Given a string array and a particular position, it returns the array element in that position or the default value if the array does not contain an element for that position.
        Parameters:
        array - the string array from which to get the element
        position - the position of the element
        defaultValue - the default value returned in case there is no element in that position
        Returns:
        the element from the array in that position, or the default value if there is no element
